about_the_game:
After Captain Burcea's discovery from the previous game, the secret services started experimenting with what they found, but everything goes out of control and a virus is created by mistake... or was it? Peoples zombie-like starts wandering around and mutated creatures start killing.

You play as a scientist from the INSTITUTE OF ATOMIC PHYSICS FROM MAGURELE, you come back from holiday and find out that the laboratory has been ravaged and the city has turned into an apocalypse. From there you start an adventure to find out what happened.

Explore an apocalyptic MAGURELE CITY and the fantasy around it, and survive the undead world and the new creatures that rule now.



PLAYSTYLE

Linear gameplay, survive, explore and puzzle-like. Adventure in the unknown and experience the new improved MAGURELE MYSTERY!

FEATURES

Story-focused exploration survival
Psychedelic horror and Psychological horror

PLAY THE NEW IMAGINED MAGURELE MYSTERY AND EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTIFUL WORLD OF IT.
